publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London, nigh the three [--] in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with loss of text.
"Take this as a remembraunce, and for no other cause: esteeme not the gift, but the good wyll of Dawse [i.e. Thomas Dawson?]"
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
